feed.title: Ghost Releases

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.81.0
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed missing source + resized images producing rendered 404 (#19869) - Daniel Lockyer

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.80.5...v5.81.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.81.1
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed adding recommendations with long excerpts (#19949) - Sag
  • 🐛 Fixed keeping existing attribution in recommendations (#19945) - Sag
  • 🐛 Fixed validation for offer percentage amount (#19927) - Princi

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.81.0...v5.81.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.82.0
entry.content:

  • 🐛 Fixed jerky scrolling in Site Design for Safari (#19974) - Ronald Langeveld

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.81.1...v5.82.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.82.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.82.2
entry.content:
• 🎨 Updated Source to v1.2.2 - Ghost CI
  • 🎨 Updated Casper to v5.7.2 - Ghost CI
  • 🐛 Fixed First Promoter always showing Active (#20010) - Ronald Langeveld
